title: Isolation of the protective earthing conductors
fullText:
No fixed connection shall be made between any protective earthing conductor and the general mass of earth, e.g. by means of a driven electrode.
No connection shall be made between any live (active or neutral) conductor and any protective earthing conductor of the electrical installation.
Exception: A connection may be made between the MPEC and the neutral conductor of a generating set or inverter installed in accordance with Clause 2.7.
